english.segment1: yesterday i lived for me. and i was so alone as i could be. then i saw you and how you give yourself away. and i want to live for you today
english.segment2: i'll give; i'll hold nothing. i'll give and i'll hold nothing back
english.segment3: my love is a lot like me. wanting nothing less than everything. but i know you're the only love that's true. and only giving makes me close to you
english.segment4: my hands are open, so take what you see. and i keep nothing, hold nothing back for me.
